name: Pokémon Perfect Crystal
overview: When Pokémon Crystal was released, it was the ultimate experience of classic Game Boy/Game Boy Color Pokémon. Now this classic can be played the way it always should have been! The goal of this hack has been to make an idealized definitive version of Pokémon Crystal that has every Pokémon available to catch and to fix a number of glaring glitches that hampered the original game.
